modName: Fist of the North Star complete shout v1_0jagi
summary: This mod change all humantype male nomal shout voice turns on Jagi\'s voice shout!!
descriptionHtml:
===  Fist of the North Star complete shout v1.0jagi  =======

This mod change all humantype male nomal shout voice turns on Jagi\'s voice shout!!

Have fun

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cAbr7Qm_yd0

=== Very Important===================================

Please note if you are using another mod sound system,Because this mod uses a lot of fuz files.
No problem if I there is nothing in the directory below. 

Steam > steamapps > common > skyrim > Data > sound > voice > skyrim.esm > maleeventoned

If there are files in this directory,Make a note files name in maleeventoned directory

it Useful when uninstall.

===   install   =========================================

Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.

You can find the Skyrim folder here: Steam>steamapps>common>skyrim

===   Uninstall   =======================================

Remove the following files in maleeventoned directory
